title: LifeFood Organic
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Raw food counter and retail shop with a small seating area. Food is prepackaged and refrigerated, includes a range of cold raw salads, a raw nut chili, smoothies, and raw patisserie. All raw except for bread used in the sandwiches. Retail area sells organic health care and beauty products. Uses honey and bee pollen, labeled. Has an outlet in Santa Monica.
